name: Schwalbe Ice Spiker Pro HS 379 26" Wire Tire
categories: Ice Spiker Pro HS 379 26" Wire Tire
description: Stay in control on icy roads. Light, grippy, and fast, this studded winter tire gives you traction and bite on ice, snow and slush. Each tire has 361 spikes each with a toothy tungsten carbide core, clad in weight-saving aluminum.RaceGuard belt protects against penetration punctures, while only minimally increasing weight and rolling resistanceSpikes have a tungsten carbide core for durability.To ensure that spikes are permanently fixed, tires should be run in for about 40km on asphalt while avoiding any fast acceleration or heavy braking.Sold individually.
